scripts.test: npm run test:integration && npm run test:unit
scripts.add:android: npm install @capacitor/android && npx cap add android
scripts.add:ios: npm install @capacitor/android && npx cap add ios
scripts.remove:android: npm run rmdir -- android && npm uninstall @capacitor/android
scripts.remove:ios: npm run rmdir -- ios && npm uninstall @capacitor/ios
scripts.build:capacitor: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.rmdir: node -e "var fs = require('fs');process.argv.slice(1).map((fpath)=>{ try {fs.rmdirSync(fpath,{recursive: true})} catch(e){console.warn('Error folder:', fpath, e)}});process.exit(0);"
